name: Fariha Afsana Shupti!!!
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the luck always be with you whatever you do! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! We know each other for more than 4 years. Well At least I know you for more than 4 years. I adore you from the very beginning. The owl who used to come to the class in the morning and used to give a short peek at the class somehow caught my attention. I wanted to become your friend. But, the Mohaiminul inside me didn't allow Tasin to do so. However, after 4.5 long years, your cat , 'Ryu', who adopted you obviously helped me gather the courage and finally text you something other than 'Happy Birthday or Eid Mubarak'. Well, I hope we are friends by now, but even if we are not, at least now you know I exist :3. Happy Birthday once again.
text2: That's what I was planning to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are a cute littol non venomous, non lethal fast striking human
outroText: I hope you you liked it.
replayText: click here, if you want to watch it again. Tadah
